name: Shotgun Arena
description:
Game created for the Very First Extra Credit Game Jam, packed with zombies and guns and more zombies and oh god they are getting everywhere !!

Can't make an executable because i made it on Game Maker Studio 2 and was on trial version, so if you can run the file enjoy or else i'm as sad as you buddy.

I'll probably remake it later on another software because i really liked the idea, but with even more guns, more zombies and maybe more maps ! And this time with a real executable. Yay !
